name: Mistletoe's Purrfect Christmas
description:
Mistletoe's Purrfect Christmas is a festive platformer about a cat named Mistletoe who searches for a star to adorn the top of the family Christmas tree.  

The player guides Mistletoe through an iced gingerbread landscape, fighting naughty toys and delicacies while collecting baubles and presents along the way. How many secrets can you uncover in this seasonal side-scrolling adventure? 

The game features one fully playable level. More levels may be added in the future, as well as additional themes.

Stephan Bester – Game Design, Programming, Music, Level Art
Marli Bester – Primary Art, Additional Level Art
My wife Liz  – Special Thanks
